articles.author: Amy Maxmen
articles.title: How America lost control of the bird flu, setting the stage for another pandemic - OregonLive
articles.description: Nearly a year into the first outbreak of the bird flu among cattle, the virus shows no sign of slowing.
articles.content: Keith Poulsens jaw dropped when farmers showed him images on their cellphones at the World Dairy Expo in Wisconsin in October. A livestock veterinarian at the University of Wisconsin, Poulsen had see… [+21468 chars]

articles.title: Friday's Mega Millions drawing is worth an estimated $1.15 billion, one of the game's top jackpots - The Associated Press
